mapper.insert: insert into T_STAFF( S_NAME, S_PASS, S_SEX, S_PHONE, S_EMAIL, S_BANKCARD, S_DATE, S_DEPARTMENT, S_POSITION)VALUES (#{sName},#{sPass},#{sSex},#{sPhone},#{sEmail},#{sBankCard},#{sDate},#{sDepartment},#{sPosition})
mapper.update: update T_STAFF set S_NAME=#{sName}, S_PASS=#{sPass}, S_SEX=#{sSex}, S_PHONE=#{sPhone}, S_EMAIL=#{sEmail}, S_BANKCARD=#{sBankCard}, S_DEPARTMENT=#{sDepartment}, S_POSITION=#{sPosition},S_STATE=#{sState} where S_ID=#{sId}
mapper.select: select * from T_STAFF WHERE S_NAME=#{sName} and S_PASS=#{sPass}
